comments:
Build ID: WTP 15/20

Steps To Reproduce:
In a product based on WTP 1.5 with many plugins 
Launch product with console log
1. Create an Ear project j2ee version <=1.4
2. Create a java project
3. Select Ear, Right click-Properties-J2EE Module Dependencies.

See this in the console (NOTE no error in log)

Problem happens because
When you select the java project to be added to Ear, two things happen

1. JavaProjectMigrationOperation (to convert java project to a utility project)
2. CreateReference..Operation    (to add a reference to the Ear's .component)

In this product we noticed that 

JavaProjectMigrationOperation was somehow trying to Add to Ear, its not supposed to do that

Fixed by setting a flag in UtilityFacetInstallDataModelProvider's datamodel
in JavaProjectMigrationOperation

udm.setBooleanProperty(IJ2EEModuleFacetInstallDataModelProperties.ADD_TO_EAR, false);

Created an attachment (id=66559)
patch to not add to ear in Java...Operation

traces.message: Cannot modify faceted project from within a facet delegate.
Cannot modify faceted project from within a facet delegate.
